meanings.definition: To turn or rotate the hand or foot so that the palm or sole faces downward.
meanings.sent1: She was pronating her wrist during the exercise.
meanings.sent2: He learned about pronating his foot to improve his running form.
meanings.sent3: The cat was pronating its paw to reach for the toy under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's graceful movements resembled pronating hands in slow motion.
meanings.sent5: The chef demonstrated pronating the dough to shape it into a perfect circle.
